energy.usef.dso.workflow.settlement.initiate

Class DsoInitiateSettlementCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.workflow.coordinator.AbstractSettlementCoordinator
      • energy.usef.dso.workflow.settlement.initiate.DsoInitiateSettlementCoordinator

  • public class DsoInitiateSettlementCoordinator
extends AbstractSettlementCoordinator
    DSO Initiate Settlement workflow coordinator. This workflow is cut into two parts:

  • 1. prepare initiate settlement sends a MeterDataQuery
  • 2. finalise initiate settlement triggered by the MeterDataQueryResponseController workflow.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class energy.usef.core.workflow.coordinator.AbstractSettlementCoordinator

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void finalizeUnfinishedInitiateSettlements(FinalizeUnfinishedInitiateSettlementEvent event)
      Fired every few minutes (ConfigDsoParam.DSO_METER_DATA_QUERY_EXPIRATION_CHECK_INTERVAL_IN_MINUTES) to check if there are unfinished initiate settlement workflows older than x hours ( ConfigDsoParam.DSO_METER_DATA_QUERY_EXPIRATION_IN_HOURS) that need to be finished.

      Gets the workflow name which will be used to invoke the PBC.

      • handleCollectSmartMeterDataEvent

        public void handleCollectSmartMeterDataEvent(@Observes(during=AFTER_COMPLETION)
                                             CollectSmartMeterDataEvent event)
        Preparation of the Initiate Settlement process.
        Parameters:
        event - the CollectSmartMeterDataEvent that triggers the process.

      • finalizeUnfinishedInitiateSettlements

        public void finalizeUnfinishedInitiateSettlements(@Observes
                                                  FinalizeUnfinishedInitiateSettlementEvent event)
        Fired every few minutes (ConfigDsoParam.DSO_METER_DATA_QUERY_EXPIRATION_CHECK_INTERVAL_IN_MINUTES) to check if there are unfinished initiate settlement workflows older than x hours ( ConfigDsoParam.DSO_METER_DATA_QUERY_EXPIRATION_IN_HOURS) that need to be finished.
        Parameters:
        event - The FinalizeUnfinishedInitiateSettlementEvent that triggers the process.

      • handleDsoInitiateSettlement

                                        FinalizeInitiateSettlementEvent finalizeInitiateSettlementEvent)
        Handles the event triggering the initiation of the settlement.
        Parameters:
        finalizeInitiateSettlementEvent - CollectSmartMeterDataEvent.
